overviewTranslations.overview: Ο Τζίμι παίρνει ακόμα πιο ακραία μέτρα για να διατηρήσει στη ζωή την καριέρα του ως δικηγόρος, ενώ ο Μάικ παρασύρεται από ένα μυστηριώδες νέο πρόσωπο.

The repercussions of Chuck's scheme test Jimmy and Kim's fledgling law practices -- and their romance -- as never before. This imminent existential threat presses Jimmy’s faltering moral compass to the limit. Meanwhile, Mike searches for a mysterious adversary who seems to know almost everything about his business.
Jimmy egyre kétségbeesettebb terveket sző, hogy jogi karrierjét megmentse, Mike pedig egy titokzatos új alak bűvkörébe kerül.
Jimmy podejmuje coraz bardziej desperackie kroki, by ratować swoją karierę prawniczą. Mike jest zafascynowany nową tajemniczą osobą.
Jimmy recorre a medidas cada vez mais desesperadas na tentativa de manter a sua carreira de advogado. Mike envolve-se com uma nova figura misteriosa.
Jimmy apela para soluções cada vez mais desesperadas para manter suas conquistas e carreira de advogado, e as ações de Mike o levam à órbita de uma figura misteriosa.
